title: Warm Potato Salad
ingredients: {2 c. cubed red potatoes,2 Tbsp. finely chopped purple onion,1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. white wine vinegar,1 Tbsp. freeze-dried chives,1 tsp. olive oil,1/4 tsp. sugar,1/4 tsp. salt,1/4 tsp. pepper}
directions: {Place potatoes in a saucepan. Add water to cover.,Bring to a boil.,"Cover, reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.",Drain.,Place potatoes and onion in a bowl. Combine vinegar and remaining ingredients.,Stir well. Add to the potato mixture; toss gently to coat.,Yields 4 servings (about 69 calories per 1/2 cup serving).}

title: Rotini Salad
ingredients: {12 oz. pkg. rotini,6 oz. pkg. Good Seasons Zesty Italian salad mix,16 oz. Kraft Zesty Italian dressing,"2 cucumbers, diced","2 tomatoes, diced","1 bell pepper, diced","1 medium size purple onion, diced","black olives, optional"}
directions: {Cook rotini according to pkg. directions. Mix all ingredients together with rotini and refrigerate.}
ner: {rotini,Italian salad mix,Italian dressing,cucumbers,tomatoes,bell pepper,purple onion,black olives}

title: African Yam Fritters
ingredients: {1 1/2 lb. yams,1 egg,1 chopped onion,1 chopped tomato,"1 small green chile, minced",1/2 c. bread crumbs,peanut oil,pinch of cayenne pepper,salt and pepper}
directions: {"Boil, peel and mash yams.",Beat egg.,"Saute tomato, chile and onion in peanut oil until onion is transparent and soft.","Combine sauteed mixture, egg, bread crumbs, seasonings and yams.",Form mixture into patties and brown on both sides.,Eat!,Makes 10 small servings.}

title: Savory Pork Chops
directions: {Select chops 3/4-inch thick.,Salt and dredge with flour; fry in small amount of oil until brown on both sides.}

title: Szechuan Sesame Noodles
ingredients: {1 lb. linguini,2 Tbsp. oil,3 Tbsp. peanut butter,2 tsp. chili powder,2 tsp. Tabasco sauce,1 1/2 Tbsp. garlic,3 Tbsp. soy sauce,1 Tbsp. oil,2 tsp. fresh ginger,1 tsp. salt,2 tsp. sugar,3 Tbsp. sesame seed}
directions: {Cook 1 pound of linguini in water with 1 tablespoon oil to prevent sticking.,"Drain, rinse and add 1 tablespoon oil to toss."}
ner: {linguini,oil,peanut butter,chili powder,Tabasco sauce,garlic,soy sauce,oil,fresh ginger,salt,sugar,sesame seed}
